update sys_config
introduce_pic_url = #{introducePicUrl},
copyright = #{copyright},
create_user_id = #{createUserId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
logo_pic_url = #{logoPicUrl}
where id = #{id}
